I am the mathematics of an unfair world.
Less than, greater than feature prominently in my activities.
I can have an infinite number of solutions.
My nearest cousin is an equation.
Who am I?
I am a mathematical relation.
I am popular with numbers.
With me every number is related to itself and nothing else.
With me, two numbers are related if their difference is zero.

Who am I?
I am many things to different people.
